content: **crocheted coasters in drops paris theme christmas and new year ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #cinnamonwhispercoaster drops design pattern w-961 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** large coaster approx 12 cm in diameter small coaster approx 10 cm in diameter **yarn** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 68 almond 1 large coaster weighs approx 13 g 1 small coaster weighs approx 10 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge** 17 treble crochets in width and 10 row in height with hook size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm 17 double crochets in width and 20 row in height with hook size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
